text: Aleksandr Shatskikh (21 January 1974 – 30 November 2020) was a Kazakh footballer. He played as a striker. He was born in Taldıqorğan, Kazakhstan. His career lasted from 1990 to 2009. Shatskikh played club football for Zhetysu / Taldykorgan, Qaynar, Chkalovets, Astana Aqmola / Zhenis Astana, Irtysh Pavlodar, CSKA-Qayrat Almaty, Esil Bogatyr, Megasport and Lokomotiv Astana. He appeared once for the Kazakhstan national team in 2003. Shatskikh died on 30 November 2020, aged 46. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Kazakhstani sportspeople
title: Aleksandr Shatskikh
